items.title: ‘She’s not working outside the home’: My mother, 63, inherited $100,000. Is she too old to invest in the stock market?

items.title: Two thieves bought a $500K lottery ticket with a stolen credit card. The victim wants $250K. Does he deserve it?

items.title: Jeremy Grantham on the meltdown coming for U.S. stocks and where he’s putting his money now
